body:
I'm having trouble building gettext on some ancient SuSE11; see attached build log.  Has anyone come across this before?  `gettext/package.py` has not changed since last August.

```
libtool: link: /gpfsm/dnb53/rpfische/spack-tools/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -fPIC -o .libs/msgcomm msgcomm-msgcomm.o  ./.libs/libgettextsrc.so /gpfsm/dnb53/rpfische/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-WhGuEm/gettext-0.19.8.1/gettext-tools/gnulib-lib/.libs/libgettextlib.so -lacl /usr/lib64/libxml2.so -ldl -lz -lm -lncurses /gpfsm/dnb53/rpfische/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-WhGuEm/gettext-0.19.8.1/gettext-tools/intl/.libs/libintl.so -lc -fopenmp -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/gpfsm/dnb53/rpfische/spack-tools/opt/spack/linux-suse_linux11-x86_64/gcc-5.3.0/gettext-0.19.8.1-odf5uuy4jjcxpn3tcuogw7liukyqmusr/lib
./.libs/libgettextsrc.so: undefined reference to `xmlOutputBufferGetContent'
./.libs/libgettextsrc.so: undefined reference to `xmlXPathSetContextNode'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/717680/spack-build.out.txt)
